ruleset.name: Apex Naming Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex naming conventions

rule.name: NoAbbreviations
rule.message: Abbreviations are not allowed. Use complete words instead. Allowed: i, c, e (exceptions), Id suffix, acronyms as words (Api, Url, Html)
rule.description: Abbreviations are not allowed in identifiers. Use complete words instead. Allowed exceptions: i, c, e (for exceptions), Id suffix, acronyms as words (Api, Url, Html).

property.name: xpath
property.value: //VariableDeclaration[ VariableExpression[ ( @Image = 'ctx' or @Image = 'idx' or @Image = 'msg' or @Image = 'cfg' or @Image = 'val' or @Image = 'acc' or @Image = 'con' or @Image = 'opp' or @Image = 'param' or @Image = 'attr' or @Image = 'elem' or @Image = 'prev' or @Image = 'curr' or @Image = 'src' or @Image = 'dest' or @Image = 'dst' or @Image = 'len' or @Image = 'pos' or @Image = 'mgr' or @Image = 'svc' or @Image = 'util' or @Image = 'calc' or @Image = 'init' or @Image = 'ref' or @Image = 'desc' or @Image = 'impl' or @Image = 'repo' or @Image = 'col' or @Image = 'hdr' or @Image = 'doc' or @Image = 'spec' or @Image = 'req' or @Image = 'res' or @Image = 'resp' or @Image = 'fmt' or @Image = 'lbl' or @Image = 'opt' or @Image = 'addr' or @Image = 'org' ) and not(ends-with(@Image, 'Id')) and not(ends-with(@Image, 'Api')) and not(ends-with(@Image, 'Url')) and not(ends-with(@Image, 'Html')) ] ]
